content.html: This may seem like an odd thing to celebrate to neurotypical folks, but for folks who deal with ADHD and/or depression like me, this will seem like sorcery: For the past few weeks, I’ve been folding and putting away my laundry as soon as it comes out of the dryer.
content.value:
This may seem like an odd thing to celebrate to neurotypical folks, but for folks who deal with ADHD and/or depression like me, this will seem like sorcery:
For the past few weeks, I’ve been folding and putting away my laundry as soon as it comes out of the dryer.
